name: Hearth Beat
description:
Hearth Beat is a student made roguelike action adventure, which aims to blend narrative within the loopable roguelike formula. The player will assume the role of Allen Welsch, a detective investigating a community club with a music theme, where something definitely happened...

This is a playtest version, we would really appreciate if you could give it a try and fill the following questionaire: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSfjfSbdxtQdk5zqqBuuroc2Eq5OT7F4ON36GmFsGp62-0CtpA/viewform
